metadata.title: CVE-2020-24027 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Live Networks, Inc., liblivemedia version 20200625, there is a potentialbuffer overflow bug in the server handling of a RTSP "PLAY" command, whenthe command specifies seeking by absolute time.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
